messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Juillet especially
messages.msgSnippet: Juillet,   I enjoyed this response because my boy is in school.  and some of the suggestions I do already  -- like having him pick the clothes out the night
messages.messageBody:
Juillet,
  I enjoyed this response because my boy is in school.  and some of the suggestions I do already  -- like having him pick the clothes out the night before or I do if he wants me to (often he asks me too).  I try to be in a good mood (not always easy! -- rather not get up tee hee) , they offer free breakfast at school so that helps with not having to wake up even earlier. I still walk out every morning to the bus and drive him often when asked (and pick him up) . I volunteer once a week in the class and try to do things with the pta.  (funny side note though the president of the pta and treasurer is homeschooling their children next year:) 
  So I guess I am grasping unschooling more and more and I am aware of my kids more!!   good gut instinct to post for us with schooled kids:)!! thank you























[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
